Log in with Facebook so that you can chat, attend events and share your VR experience with friends.
Connect with people on Oculus so that you can do fun activities together, including multiplayer games and group chats.

Go to Storage
Device Data (Newer)
Cloud Data (Newer)
Saved data on your device and in the cloud don\'t match. Would you like to use the data on this device, or the data in the cloud?
Your device failed to synchronise with the cloud. You can still launch the app, but it may result in lost data or progress.
After you\'ve picked up your controllers, please return to the centre of your playing area and select Continue.

To use this app, please pick up your controllers and select Continue.

Tip: Pass-through is a feature that lets you see your physical environment with your headset on. You can turn on pass-through now to find your controllers.
Turn On Pass-through
After you\'ve put your controllers down, please return to the centre of your playing area and select Continue.

To use this app, please put your controllers down and select Continue.

Tip: Pass-through is a feature that lets you see your physical environment with your headset on. You can turn on pass-through now to find a place to put your controllers down.
Your report won\'t be saved.
Content Localisation
Third-party

By submitting, you agree to the Oculus Terms of Service, which supplement the Facebook Terms of Service. Learn how we use your data in the Oculus Data Policy, which supplements the Facebook Data Policy.
Includes packages installed, memory usage and breakdown
Sorry, an error occurred while submitting your report
Describe what went wrong and how you encountered the problem.
Updating to the latest software version may fix the problem you\'re experiencing.
Ensure that the controller battery has enough charge
Try Again
Go to ocul.us/cast on a supported web browser such as Google Chrome and enter the following code. This code is valid for the next minute.
Your Headset Is Ready to Cast
The application could not be launched. Please wait a few minutes, and if the problem persists, contact your administrator.
If you want to be Facebook friends, you\'ll need to add %1$s after unblocking them.
If you want to be Facebook friends, you\'ll need to add %1$s after unblocking them.
The visualisations will only appear within your Guardian boundary, and it works up to 9 feet in front of you. This feature works best in rooms with ample lighting.
The visualisations will only appear within your Guardian boundary, and it works up to 3 metres in front of you. This feature works best in rooms with ample lighting.
Guardian can now show you a visualisation of people, pets or objects that enter your boundary when you\'re in VR. Enable this feature to help increase awareness of your physical surroundings.

You\'ll only see visualisations of things larger than the size of your hand. For example, you will see a visualisation of a person who has entered your boundary, but not one of a small toy car. This feature will not show your surfaces such as walls or mirrors, so please stay alert and keep your playing space free of intrusions.
Detectable Object Sizes and Customisation
Adjust the headset up and down your face until the green lines are not blurry.
Your Headset Is Not Connected to the Internet
You have a new request to share what you\'re doing in VR with another device.
Don\'t show this warning dialogue again
Allow headset casting
Cast to your private link (oculus.com/casting) and view in a supported web browser such as Google Chrome.
Go to oculus.com/casting on your computer within 60 seconds. Make sure that you use a supported browser such as Google Chrome.
Your Headset Is Ready to Cast
If you\'re in shared groups or rooms with this account, you\'ll still be able to see and communicate with each other. You can leave groups or rooms at any time.
Block messages and calls
Unblock messages and calls
Block a member
Blocked members
Report a member
You won\'t receive anything that may have been sent while the block was in effect.
The device storage is critically low. You have less than 500 MB remaining.
The device storage is getting low. You have less than 2 GB remaining.
To receive phone notifications in your headset, go to your headset settings in the Oculus App and select Phone Notifications.
Access Rift apps while your Quest is plugged into your PC. You can enable/disable this from your settings at any time
You\'ve returned to your Quest home menu. Unplug your headset and plug it in again if you want to re-enable Oculus Link.
You\'ve returned to your Quest home menu. Unplug your headset and plug it in again if you want to re-enable Oculus Link.
Make sure that the USB cable is plugged into your headset and into a USB 3 port on your computer. The Oculus app on your PC also needs to be running.
You\'ve returned to your Quest home menu. Unplug your headset and plug it in again if you want to re-enable Oculus Link.
You\'ve returned to your Quest home menu. Unplug your headset and plug it in again if you want to re-enable Oculus Link.
An error has occurred. You can start a new party or explore Oculus Home.
The party that you\'re trying to join is full. You can start a new party or explore Oculus Home.
Party Is Full
The party that you\'re trying to join has ended or you can longer join it. You can start a new party or go back to where you were.

Increase your display refresh rate to 120 Hz when requested by supported apps. This may affect battery usage, headset temperature and the visual quality of some system features.
Checking for updates...
A system update is available. Make sure that your device remains plugged in and powered on. A restart will be required.
The device must have at least 1 MB free to be updated.
The device must be at least %1$d%% charged to begin. Please plug in the device and charge it to %1$d%% before starting the update.
The device must be plugged in to begin the update. Please plug in the device before starting the update.
Turn On Tracking
Double-press the Oculus button to use voice commands
Use voice commands while playing games or in other apps
In-app Voice Commands

When this is turned off, your voice interactions won\'t be stored. Any previous voice interactions will still be stored â€“ you can view, hear or delete them at any time. A trained team may review a sample to make our voice services smarter and more accurate. Learn More
View, listen to and delete your voice commands here or in the Oculus mobile app. Learn More
Automatic
Headset Auto-sleep

Automatically switch to hand tracking when you put your controllers down. If this setting is off, you\'ll need to manually switch by using the Hand Tracking button in the Settings section of the universal menu.
Auto-switch Between Hands and Controllers
Headset Auto-wake
Use your Bluetooth-connected mouse or trackpad in VR.
Bluetooth mouse and trackpad
Make the Menu button on your left controller behave as the Oculus button to pause apps and reset the view
Move the Oculus button to your left hand and controller. The menu button will be accessible via your right hand and controller.
Show a red dot when casting, live-streaming or recording
Customise how your controllers work
Add/Remove

Place a virtual sofa on your real sofa so that you can see and sit on it while in your virtual home environment. This feature allows you to use your sofa as a separate seated playing area in or outside your Guardian boundary in VR.
Bring Your Sofa Into VR
Add/Remove

Place a virtual desk on your real desk so that you can see and use it while in your virtual home environment. This feature allows you to use your desk as a separate work area in or outside your Guardian boundary in VR.
Bear in mind that experimental features may stop working at any time. Please enable these features with caution, as they may increase your risk of injury or property damage.

If you enable this setting, keystroke data will be stored on your device, and only aggregated modelling information from your device will be shared with Facebook to improve the keyboard experience for everyone.
Extra-large
Looking down at an angle will make your Guardian boundary appear on the floor so that you can see where you are in your playing area.
This can\'t be undone. You\'ll need to set up Guardian again.
Remove all of your Guardian boundary history
Change the colour of your Guardian boundary. Please choose a colour that you can see clearly when your boundary appears in VR to alert you.
Boundary Colour

Use your hands as controllers. To support this feature, we analyse your hands to estimate your hand size and how they move. By enabling this feature, you agree to our collection and use of this data as detailed in our Hand Tracking Privacy Notice which explains how we collect and use this data.
Overrides the default hand tracking frequency set by the application
Hand tracking, Oculus and menu buttons, controller vibration

A low sensitivity shows you a precise outline of the person, pet or object that entered your boundary, but it will take longer to appear. A high sensitivity means that you will see the intrusion faster, but it will look less precise.
Adjust the sensitivity of the intruder\'s distance to the Guardian boundary
A lower floor height will show you more possible intrusions on the ground. A high floor height shows you fewer intrusions on the ground, and can filter out smaller people, pets or objects.
See a visualisation when people, pets or objects enter your Guardian boundary when you are in VR
See a visualisation when people, pets or objects enter your Guardian boundary when you are in VR.

If you enable this setting, keystroke data will be stored on your device, and only aggregated modelling information from your device will be shared with Facebook to improve the keyboard experience for everyone.
Require a long press to pause an app to prevent accidental presses during gameplay. This disables long press to reset view.
Long-press the Oculus Button to Pause
Enables USB connections via a confirmation dialogue
USB Connection Dialogue
Multi-tasking for Oculus Browser
Please make sure that your headset is connected to the Internet, then give your headset and controllers to the other person so that they can set up their account.
You already have app sharing enabled on another headset. To share apps on this headset, you\'ll need to disable app sharing on the other headset first.
If you can\'t access the other headset, visit the Oculus Support Centre for more info.
Oculus Support Centre
We weren\'t able to connect to the service. Please check your Internet connection.
Can\'t Enable App Sharing
You can disable app sharing at any time from your device settings.
Add up to three other accounts and share eligible apps on this device. Enabling this feature will show Accounts under Settings.
You need to remove the accounts you have added before you can disable this feature.
Share this device by adding up to three other people. Each person will need a Facebook account. Learn More
to your Quest so that they can have their own apps and settings. They\'ll need to create an Oculus account or sign in to an existing one.
so that other people can use your purchased apps on this device. They\'ll need to install any shared apps, but the apps won\'t take up more space.
by clicking your profile picture in the universal menu. Manage the other accounts and your unlock pattern in your settings.
Get Started With Device and App Sharing
Please make sure that your headset is connected to the Internet to continue.
This device is missing a device identity. Please visit fburl.com/oc_device_identity for help.
Change your display to warmer colours, which may be easier on your eyes
To start tracking your calories and move minutes in VR, you\'ll need to turn on the Move app.
Open Browser while in app.
Adjust the pass-through hands contrast.
Pass-through Contrast
Define the pass-through keyboard area
See your keyboard in pass-through in VR
Pass-through Keyboard
Double-tap the left or right side of your headset to turn on pass-through at any time
Pass-through Shortcut
Apps will appear here when you first receive notifications from them on your headset.
Choose which notifications you want to receive.
Choose which notifications you want to receive and when you\'ll see them in VR.
To receive phone notifications in your headset, go to your headset settings in the Oculus app and select Phone Notifications.
[FB only] Try experimental pointer filters for hand tracking
Auto-wake and sleep headset
If the Pass-through slider is set to full Pass-through, you won\'t need to use a Guardian boundary unless you enter an immersive experience. The slider is accessible in quick settings.
Skip Guardian Setup with Pass-through Slider
A lower Guardian sensitivity means you\'ll be alerted less when moving faster and closer towards a boundary edge. This may increase your risk of injury or damage.
Stationary Boundary: Pass-through
Turn On Tracking
Turn On Tracking
[FB-Only] system theme
See your Bluetooth-connected keyboard in VR.
Troubleshoot tracking problems by selecting the power frequency of sockets in your region
Detects your device\'s movement and position in a playing area
All voice activity will be deleted. You can review future voice activity later. You\'ll still be able to use voice.
View, listen to and delete your voice commands here or in the Oculus mobile app. Learn More
Activate voice commands with the \"Hey Facebook\" wake word. When this setting is enabled and your mic is on, Oculus will listen for the wake word. Restart required. Learn More
\"Hey Facebook\"
People in this party will be able to see your Oculus activity independent of your activity setting.
Choose an app for this party
Create party
Choose a location for this party
People can share the link with their friends through Messenger. You can update link sharing at any time from the party settings.

People you block can no longer invite you to events or parties, start a conversation with you, add you as a friend or see things that you post on your timeline. If you\'re friends, blocking someone will also unfriend them.
Are you sure that you want to leave?
Oculus friends
Add to party
Remove %1$s from party
Are you sure that you want to leave your current party? You won\'t be able to join this party again unless you are reinvited.
Changing this party from invitation-only to open to friends will make it visible to anyone who is a friend of someone in the current party.
Change to open to friends
Changing this party from open to friends to invitation-only will make it accessible only to people currently in the party or people you send invitations to.
Change to Invitation-only Party
People in this party will be able to see your Oculus activity independent of your activity setting.
This party can only be joined with an invitation.
Anyone with the link can join this party and share this link with their friends through Messenger. The party leader can turn off link sharing at any time.
Join party
People can find and join this party from a party member\'s profile.
Friends can join this party without an invitation
Anyone can share this link through Messenger. The link expires six hours after it has been created or once the party leader turns it off.
Party link
Party access
There are people in this party you have blocked.
Invitation Request

Stationary Guardian has a new, more comfortable boundary based on Pass-through. Now, when your headset gets close to the boundary edge, you\'ll see a real-time view of your physical environment instead of boundary lines in VR. Try it by carefully leaning towards the boundary edge. You can turn this feature off at any time in your settings.

Stationary Guardian has a new, more comfortable boundary based on Pass-through. Now, when your headset gets close to the boundary edge, you\'ll see a real-time view of your physical environment instead of boundary lines in VR. You can turn this feature off at any time in your settings.
Not Now
Stationary Boundary Uses Pass-through

Keyboard tracking is only supported for flat surface movements and works best in a well-lit room with the keyboard placed on a flat, contrasting surface. To see your hands while typing, turn on Hand Tracking and Auto-enable Hands in Settings > Device > Hands and Controllers.
